review: I purchased this for my parents because I thought the voice search would be great tool for them.  The voice search is useless because it takes you directly to "pay" options even if it is available for free through other applications.  The other problem is apps like Showtime Anytime aren't available if you certain cable providers. I bought a Roku stick for my sister after the Fire TV experience with my parents and it was far superior in it's user experience and the availability of apps.  I strongly recommend the Roku Stick over the Fire TV.
author: Duke
